description: Enterprise techniques used by TinyZBot, ATT&CK software S0004 v1.0
name: TinyZBot (S0004)

techniques.comment: TinyZBot contains functionality to collect information from the clipboard.[1]
TinyZBot supports execution from the command-line.[1]
TinyZBot can install as a Windows service for persistence.[1]
TinyZBot can create a shortcut in the Windows startup folder for persistence.[1]
